ingredients.item: ½ x 400g pack Waitrose Frozen Fruits de Mer cooked from frozen
227 g can essential Waitrose Chopped tomatoes
100g Icelandic cod fillet skinned and cubed (or fry tilapia fillets, cut into chunks

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a medium-sized pan and cook the onion for 5 minutes until soft. Add the garlic, bay leaves and saffron and cook for 1 minute. Stir in the tomatoes and fish stock.  Bring to the boil and add the cod or tilapia with the seafood. Simmer gently for 5–10 minutes until the prawns have turned pink, and the seafood and fish are cooked through.  Check seasoning and discard the bay leaves. Serve garnished with chopped parsley
